sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Fire an event to calculate total service cost and generate invoice
Log that all tasks are marked close
Wait till an user is assigned to this request task

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name,

There's a new Service Request (Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Number) pending your approval. Please approve it to proceed further.

Regards,
NowMechanic Admin

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait till the payment status is "Complete" or "Failed"
Log error if invoice is not generated
Looking up all request tasks in this service request
Log that all tasks in this request are assigned

sys_variable_value.value: All tasks in the request are assigned

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Fetch the created invoice record
wait till the request state is approved or rejected
Logging Request State
Wait till the state is complete
Mark the service request state as "Closed Incomplete"
Mark the service request state as "Closed Incomplete"

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 6 - For Each➛...➛First name,

There's a new task (6 - For Each➛...➛Number) assigned to you. Please pick this at the earliest.

Regards,
NowMechanic Admin

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create a payment record for the invoice with status as "Pending"

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: For each request task in this service request
If the request state is approved
For each request task in this service request

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name,

There's a new Service Request (Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Number) pending your approval. Please approve it to proceed further.

Regards,
NowMechanic Admin
